meanings.sent1: My siblings always fratch over who gets to choose the TV show.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors fratch loudly about the property line.
meanings.sent3: The dogs fratch over the last bone in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The politicians fratch endlessly during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The children fratch over who gets the biggest slice of cake.

meanings.sent1: The fratch between the two teams could be heard from across the field.
meanings.sent2: There was a fratch at the town hall meeting over the new construction project.
meanings.sent3: The fratch between the cats over the sunny spot on the window sill was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The fratch between the birds over the last worm was a sight to see.
meanings.sent5: The fratch between the students in the cafeteria caused quite a commotion.
